title: Congratulating Dr. Eric Donnenfeld upon the occasion of his designation as recipient of the 2010 Distinguished Service Award by the Nassau Surgical Society
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION congratulating Dr. Eric Donnenfeld upon the occa-
sion  of  his designation as recipient of the 2010 Distinguished Service
Award by the Nassau Surgical Society

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize that  the
quality  and  character of life in the communities across New York State
are enhanced by the concerned and dedicated efforts of individuals  that
generously contribute to the welfare of the community and its citizenry;
and
  WHEREAS, It is also the custom of this Legislative Body to acknowledge
outstanding individuals whose professional lives, personal endeavors and
community  service  are  an example and inspiration to their colleagues,
friends, and family; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to congratu-
late Dr. Eric Donnenfeld upon the occasion of his designation as recipi-
ent of the 2010 Distinguished  Service  Award  by  the  Nassau  Surgical
Society; and
  WHEREAS,  Roslyn, New York, resident, Dr. Eric Donnenfeld, is a found-
ing partner at Ophthalmic Consultants of Long Island (OCLI); he has been
a leader in ophthalmology for more than 20 years; and
  WHEREAS, OCLI and all of its doctors  are  passionate  about  teaching
others  in  the  ophthalmic  field  and  have  been able to achieve this
mission through the Nassau Surgical Society's Annual  Clinic  Day  where
new ideas and information can be shared and exchanged; and
  WHEREAS,  Dr.  Eric  Donnenfeld  has  worked to develop and expand the
Society's  Annual  Clinic  Day  as  a  continuing  education  event  for
surgeons; and
  WHEREAS,  The Board members of the Nassau Surgical Society unanimously
chose Dr. Eric Donnenfeld as the recipient  of  the  2010  Distinguished
Service Award based on his academic and professional excellence in addi-
tion to the contributions he has made over the years to the Society; and
  WHEREAS,  In  addition,  Dr.  Eric Donnenfeld has recently traveled to
Yerevan, Armenia, to perform a new, safe and effective glaucoma  surgery
on patients that otherwise may have gone blind; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period of his professional and communi-
ty  service,  a  period of constructive involvement, Dr. Eric Donnenfeld
has stood constant in dignity, good grace and humor, and has earned  the
respect and admiration of his colleagues, family and friends; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual  for  the  benefit of others which Dr. Eric Donnenfeld has displayed
throughout his life; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that  when  individ-
uals  of  such  noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our atten-
tion, they should be recognized by all the citizens of this great Empire
State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate Dr. Eric Donnenfeld upon the occasion of his designation as
recipient of the 2010 Distinguished Service Award by the Nassau Surgical
Society; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Dr. Eric Donnenfeld, Roslyn, New York.
